description: This source file defines the ApiClient class for interacting with a backend API, providing methods for health checks, conversions, and retrieving graph data, as well as handling API exceptions.

classes.name: ApiClient
classes.description: A client to interact with backend API endpoints, supporting health checks, conversion requests, and fetching graph data.

classes.name: ApiException
classes.description: An exception class for handling API errors with detailed info.

methods.name: ApiClient.create
methods.description: Factory method that creates an ApiClient instance with a base URL from environment variables or default.

methods.name: _uri
methods.description: Constructs a Uri object from a given path and optional query parameters.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Checks the health/status of the backend API.

methods.name: convert
methods.description: Sends a conversion request to the backend and returns a ConvertResponse.

methods.name: getGraph
methods.description: Retrieves graph data for a specific job ID from the backend.

methods.name: _safeMessage
methods.description: Extracts a user-friendly message from an HTTP response.
